messages.message: I agree - I don't think immediate action is needed for exposing OCR output. We should understand their need and then see where it falls for prioritization. I only flagged it on this thread so that we noted the request.
Weâ€™d need it for marketing purposes, but if this could possibly be satisfied by the old api, then that totally works for me :)

We actually had a followup from Fintru today to set them up. What I gathered (@Bastiane @Ben Wood feel free to add), is that they don't actually want OCR output. They just want the deskewed docs after we process them to correctly overlay provenance info.

For marketing, we can look into an internal-only solution without opening the can of worms to expose this externally.
The ability to do this ^ has come up multiple times (Anima, Luminai, nCino too)

Yup. We need to think through how to expose provenance and the deskewed docs cleanly here for these customers.

Another interesting insight was that these customers (at least Fintru) were basically recreating the human review in their own ops tooling. I wonder if we should spend more time to convince them that their ops team should just use AI Hub human review :slightly_smiling_face: cc: @Eric Han @andy
